channel.title: How to participate in the 2.03 Upgrade consultation?
channel.description:
_Updated - 25th October_
The [Final 2.03 Technical Proposal](https://discuss.iatistandard.org/t/final-technical-proposal-for-the-2-03-upgrade/1097?u=iati-techteam) is now available.
All proposals are now closed for discussion. Comments on the final technical proposal can be made on the Discuss post above. The deadline for these comments is the **3rd November 2017**.
In the next stage (which runs to the end of November) the Final Technical Proposals will be added to github by the IATI tech team.
Subscribe to this sub-category to receive notifications about any new posts and keep up-to-date with discussions.
